metadata.title: CVE-2023-52806 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ALSA: hda: Fix possible null-ptr-deref when assigning a streamWhile AudioDSP drivers assign streams exclusively of HOST or LINK type,nothing blocks a user to attempt to assign a COUPLED stream. Assupplied substream instance may be a stub, what is the case whencode-loading, such scenario ends with null-ptr-deref.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
